promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute mythical goat electric-type pokemon wearing golden armor. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltaron, a a chibi cute mythical goat electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Lightning Slam, Nature Dive. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "electric" or "Voltaron". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, goat-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This peppy mythic creature, resembling a tiny caprine, thrives among craggy peaks. Known for its Lightning Slam and Nature Dive, it charges playfully.
